Html:
Hello All,

This might sound stupid... so excuse me for asking

I want to know how can I add the MainMap control on the toolbox, as I tried several times to add both GMap.NET.Core.dll and GMap.NET.WindowsPresentation.dll to the controller but both give me the same error saying the following:

"There is no component in the dll that can be placed in the toolbox"

 

So the question now is how to add this in the toolbox, or even how to add the MainMap to the application form.

THANK YOU!

I knew the problem, as I was trying to add GMap.NET.WindowsPresentation.dll and I was supposed to add GMap.NET.WindowForm.dll.

Thank anyways.
you can add both versions ;} wpf has better dealing with markers
